Box-Sizing an Image
Mar 01, 2013 •

Recently while I'm adding a feature image on the blog entries I encountered somewhat an obvious thing that we should be aware of. We know how box-sizing keeps the border and the padding inside the box instead of adding extra width on the box outside. But do you know that if you apply it to an image itself together with a border, it will distort/blur the image by squeezing it inside? This is not what we want especially if you have the image optimized for a fixed width and height.
